alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 03 at 3:56AM PST until March 05 at 12:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Coachella Valley and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected for Friday night.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
